p: Finally, in microarray analyses, seven deregulated genes, the amyloid precursor protein ( APP) gene in particular, were quantified by gene expression from blood samples of T2DM and PD patients [ 63]. Actually, the expression of APP is increased in PD and prediabetic patients [ 134, 135], suggesting that high levels of the protein encoded by this gene in the blood of T2DM patients could be an indicator of neurodegeneration [ 63, 136].
